clientLogFile: C:\Program Files (x86)\Grinding Gear Games\Path of Exile\logs\Client.txt

zone.note: Stick to the right side, following the wall.
Circles indicate the area in which the quest items are grouped. Little rivers connect the three items.

zone.name: Find the bridge and place a portal.

zone.note: Go to the town at the WP, take the portal and find the Flooded Depths.
Go to town for rewards after killing the Deep Dweller.
Run top right and free Navali.
Go right to find the exit, there is a trial in this zone that you can do later thanks to the WP.
Log out after you kill Brutus.
Look for the side of the road that has the ledge down, usually on the right side.
Look for WP first, then find Fairgraves, and move away from the plateau, generally up or down.
At WP, port back to The Ship Graveyard to either find the cave or hand in Allflame and get rewards.
Often bottom right, you can follow the spirits, if you see piles of gold you’re close to Merveil.
Go to the center, always left or right. Activate WP and follow the hallway next to the WP.
Always go up and right, do the trial in top left or do it later when you need it and are faster.
Go left when the left path spawns, otherwise loop around right side. Kill Weaver for the reward, then claim The Way Forward skillpoint.
Oak then go to the left side until the WP with the passage next to it. The side at which you enter Oak’s fort means WP is on the opposite side of the fort.
Try to determine the direction, then zig and zag accordingly through the ruins.
Find the grates to the sewers, then take the stairs down, follow it until you have stairs up, then it’s fairly linear.
Going left generally has a higher chance of success. There is a trial here.
Usually up and right, go through the statue hall, check the WP (trial nearby it) and move on to find the exit.
First image is to spool and docks, second to Solaris.
Follow the carpet until the exit.
Follow the carpet until the exit.
Usually left side, sulphite is down some stairs.
First image is to Lunaris, second to The Sceptre of God.
Follow the carpet, don’t forget WP.
Follow the road until the end.
The exits can often be found by travelling diagonally.
Kill Voll on one of the three spawns.
Fairly linear, exit is usually in top left corner.
Varied layout, and many dead ends and you should look for the spirit too, if you found the exit before the spirit, leave a portal and continue.
Loop around bottom right to go to the top left end. Use WP to go to Highgate if you made a portal to search for the spirit.
Look for passages and bridges, follow those.
Look for stairs and bridges, follow those.

zone.zoneName: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
zone.note: Aim for top left, many dead ends.

zone.zoneName: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
zone.note: Aim for top left, many dead ends.
Always one boss on right side, two on the left, random boss position, WP is number 1, bosses are 2, 3 and 4.
Go up and right, cross the bridge and follow the road to a small passage to the exit.
Go all the way down, then left.
Go top left for the miasmeter, then up and right.
Go top right until you cross the bridge, then down.
Loop around clockwise.
Go up and left, and spiral counterclockwise.
Loop around counterclockwise.
One layout, multiple stops, in following steps.
Loop around clockwise.
Find multiple quest items in corners of the zone.
Go to the right side of the zone, and go to the top right corner of the zone. You might need to go up or down a bit.
Kill the Dishonoured Queen (1) on the right side to get the key to open the gate to the next zone (2) on the left side.

Follow the right hand side if you feel ready for Tukohama, capped fire resistance is suggested, alongside a good life pool. If you wish to take on Tukohama for the passive point and pantheon power later, follow the left hand side.
Follow the path until you can go right, then follow that path until you have a long path up left.
You usually want to go down or left towards the exit, there is a trial here, but it is fairly close to the WP if you want to do it later.
If you want to fight the Aberrath, go down the side of the road that has the cliff, otherwise follow the road into the next area.
Follow the road and when you reach the encampment, go down and right. If you want to kill Ryslatha, follow the path up at the WP.
Don’t forget the black flag upon entering this zone. Head down then up first, then go right, the exit can be up or down.
Follow the left hand shoreline to the boss arena. Capped cold and lightning resistance is strongly recommended. Physical mitigation is very useful too.
Don’t forget the WP, this zone leads to two new zones. Go to The Fellshrine Ruins (1) first.
There is a trial in this zone. Open the sarcophagus for the exit.
This is works just like in act two, loop around to the center, then activate the WP.
Trial on the left side. Go to the top right side, until you find the narrow long hallway.
Fairly simple, you will usually want to go to the top left or right to find the exit to The Ashen Fields.
Find and follow the thick walls to guide you to the exit.
Watch the black paint on the floor as you enter the zone to see in which direction it points you.
Try to find the path that doesn’t have a dead end, this should lead you all the way to the exit.
Pick up the quest item at (1), to use in the arena (2), then leave the arena and find the exit at (3).
This zone has many buildings, only enter and leave buildings through openings that have a guard’s corpse next to it, they lead the way, kill the gemlings.
Go up and right for the WP, then up and left for the entrance.
Follow the carpets until the end, activate the WP.
Look for staircases and go up these, when you reach the larger area again, look for the vases on the opposite wall and pick the side where there is only one.
Go up right to the supply hoist, then down left to another hoist, then up right to The Vastiri Desert.
Go right to the WP, then top left (1) for the Foothills. Kill Shakari ? Go right to (2) for the Oasis, then get the quest item in town and enter the zone.
Left or right hand wall follow, depending on bottom or top being the dead end at the entrance.
Head up to find the WP, go to (1) to get the quest item in The Boiling Lake, then to (2) for The Tunnel to continue the story.
There is a trial in this zone. Go up left, if you come across the WP you’re on the right path.
Activate the WP at the center, go to Shrine of the Winds first (2), then the refinery (1).
Follow the cart tracks to the building top right for the quest boss. Portal to town and WP back to The Quarry.
Reach the top left part of the zone in The Belly of The Beast, this leads to The Rotting core which is static, and go top left again, then you have The Black Heart.
Trial here. Left hand follow for quest item and trial.
Left hand follow, skip the 1st opening, take the 2nd and take bridge (red).
Left hand wall-follow.
Right hand follow until you come to a crossroads with 4 pillars, then go straight and up.
